title: I'm not getting my riot points and blue essence :(
body: i recently made a pbe account and for some reason I'm not getting the rp and blue essence. halp rito. my ign is pbe rockstar(i'll change it soon)

replies.body: Check out a [recent PBE post ](https://boards.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-pbe-feedback/T6INEVkN-store-back-online-within-1-hour-changes-to-rp-and-blue-essence)on this, but currenct on PBE is being changed to a daily stipend that will refresh around noon pacific time.  I hope that helps clear things up!
